creator: Alexander Terp
title: RAD-155: Bool flags should not be displayed as positional args
description:
MAYBE! I just think this is kinda weird:

`dev.rsl [package] [reinstall] [version] [release]`

here, only 'version' is a string arg, the others are bool flags.

It'd be misleading to remove package/reinstall since the first positional arg is _not_ version.

But that could be a behavior change – positional args 'skip' bool args? idk
